abstract: I know what to do; "we" don't.
snippet: I know what to do; "we" don't.
lead_paragraph: The usually perceptive Ezra Klein titles today's Wonkbook "We know what to do. We just can't seem to do it." Um, who is this "we" of whom he speaks?

headline.main: What Do You Mean We, White Man? (Fiscal Policy Edition)
